QuestData.Title: The Leftovers
QuestData.Description: We fought hard to capture this island, $r. We cleared out most of the horde scum but I can still smell their foul stench in the air.$b$bI need you to investigate the slagworks, warden's vigil and the ironclad garrison. Kill any horde that you find.$B$BYou know what they say, the only good horde is a dead horde!
QuestData.LogDescription: You have been instructed to kill 12 Horde Infantry on Tol Barad. You can find the holdouts in The Slagworks, Warden's Vigil and the Ironclad Garrison, here on Tol Barad.
